name: Huygens Principle
description: You become the person, that you killed!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (or equivalent) Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: with 512 MB VRAM compatible with DirectX 9 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Intel Core i3 (or equivalent) Memory: 4096 MB RAM Graphics: with 1024 MB VRAM compatible with DirectX 9 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 350 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible
